page.title: 03LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN HARWICH
page.content: WE INTERVIEWED MRS RUTSON WHO WAS MAYOR OF HARWICH IN 1984-1985. WE ASKED HER WHETHER SHE ENJOYED BEING MAYOR.HER REPLY WAS "YES, VERY MUCH SO". EDE AND RAVENSCROFTS IN LONDON MADE HER ROBE, AND WHEN IT NEEDS WASHING OR MENDING THEY GO TO A LADY IN HARWICH. MRS RUTSON WENT TO MANY DINNERS, LUNCHES, SPORTS DAYS, BABY COMPETITIONS, CHOOSING A MAY PRINCESS, CAROL SERVICES AND CHURCH SERVICES.SHE ENTERTAINED PEOPLE AT THE GUILDHALL INCLUDING THE CREW OF THE 'GODSPEED' OPENED THE TELEPHONE EXCHANGE AND MANY OTHER THINGS IN A BUSY YEAR. MAYOR MAKING TOOK PLACE THIS YEAR ON MAY 23RD. THE TOWN COUNCIL MET AT 11AM, IN THE GUILDHALL AND IT WAS VERY CROWDED AS THERE WERE A LARGE NUMBER OF INVITED GUESTS.
